title: Mister Hunting "Monsieur chasse" (1947 French Comedy) Frederic Duvalles, Noelle Norman

sources.title: Mister Hunting "Monsieur chasse" (1947 French Comedy) Frederic Duvalles, Noelle Norman
sources.description:
Duchotel regularly deceives his wife Léontine into believing that he is going hunting. Doctor Moricet, friend of the couple and secretly in love with Léontine, opens her eyes and decides to take her to a meeting house while Monsieur hunts. It turns out that in the same house, on the same day, Duchotel makes perfect love with Madame Cassagne, his mistress and wife of a friend of the couple. Let us add to this that young Gontran is also on the scene having an appointment with a woman of the world. What follows is an incessant chase which will become even more complicated when the police commissioner intervenes at the request of Mr. Cassagne in order to establish a finding of adultery.

Colorized version: https://youtu.be/7BtaqX2h6ts

Original title: Monsieur Chasse (1947)


Director:  Willy Rozier
Writers: Georges Feydeau, Willy Rozier
With: Frederic Duvalles, Noelle Norman, Paul Meurisse, Félix Oudart
Genre: French cinema, Comedy

@CultCinemaClassics
